00024 TPM::TPM(int M,int N) : Matrix(M*(M - 1)/2){
00025 
00026    this->N = N;
00027    this->M = M;
00028    this->n = M*(M - 1)/2;
00029 
00030    if(counter == 0){
00031 
00032       //allocatie van sp2tp
00033       s2t = new int * [M];
00034       s2t[0] = new int [M*M];
00035 
00036       for(int i = 1;i < M;++i)
00037          s2t[i] = s2t[i - 1] + M;
00038 
00039       //allocatie van t2s
00040       t2s = new int * [n];
00041 
00042       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00043          t2s[i] = new int [2];
00044 
00045       //initialisatie van de twee arrays
00046       int teller = 0;
00047 
00048       for(int i = 0;i < M;++i)
00049          for(int j = i + 1;j < M;++j){
00050 
00051             s2t[i][j] = teller;
00052 
00053             t2s[teller][0] = i;
00054             t2s[teller][1] = j;
00055 
00056             ++teller;
00057 
00058          }
00059 
00060       for(int i = 0;i < M;++i)
00061          for(int j = i + 1;j < M;++j)
00062             s2t[j][i] = s2t[i][j];
00063 
00064    }
00065 
00066    ++counter;
00067 
00068 }

00125 TPM::~TPM(){
00126 
00127    if(counter == 1){
00128 
00129       delete [] s2t[0];
00130       delete [] s2t;
00131 
00132       for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00133          delete [] t2s[i];
00134 
00135       delete [] t2s;
00136 
00137    }
00138 
00139    --counter;
00140 
00141 }

00152 double TPM::operator()(int a,int b,int c,int d) const{
00153 
00154    if( (a == b) || (c == d) )
00155       return 0;
00156    else{
00157 
00158       int i = s2t[a][b];
00159       int j = s2t[c][d];
00160 
00161       int phase = 1;
00162 
00163       if(a > b)
00164          phase *= -1;
00165       if(c > d)
00166          phase *= -1;
00167 
00168       return phase*(*this)(i,j);
00169 
00170    }
00171 
00172 }

00174 ostream &operator<<(ostream &output,const TPM &tpm_p){
00175 
00176    for(int i = 0;i < tpm_p.n;++i)
00177       for(int j = 0;j < tpm_p.n;++j){
00178 
00179          output << i << "\t" << j << "\t|\t" << tpm_p.t2s[i][0] << "\t" << tpm_p.t2s[i][1]
00180 
00181             << "\t" << tpm_p.t2s[j][0] << "\t" << tpm_p.t2s[j][1] << "\t" << tpm_p(i,j) << endl;
00182 
00183       }
00184 
00185    return output;
00186 
00187 }

00220 void TPM::hubbard(double U){
00221 
00222    int a,b,c,d;//sp orbitals
00223 
00224    double ward = 1.0/(N - 1.0);
00225 
00226    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00227 
00228       a = t2s[i][0];
00229       b = t2s[i][1];
00230 
00231       for(int j = i;j < n;++j){
00232 
00233          c = t2s[j][0];
00234          d = t2s[j][1];
00235 
00236          (*this)(i,j) = 0;
00237 
00238          //eerst hopping
00239          if( (a == c) && ( ( (b + 2)%M == d ) || ( b == (d + 2)%M ) ) )
00240             (*this)(i,j) -= ward;
00241 
00242          if( (b == c) && ( ( (a + 2)%M == d ) || ( a == (d + 2)%M ) ) )
00243             (*this)(i,j) += ward;
00244 
00245          if( (b == d) && ( ( (a + 2)%M == c ) || ( a == (c + 2)%M ) ) )
00246             (*this)(i,j) -= ward;
00247 
00248          //on site interaction
00249          if( (a % 2) == 0 && (c % 2) == 0 )
00250             if(a == (b - 1) && c == (d - 1) && a == c)
00251                (*this)(i,j) += U;
00252 
00253       }
00254 
00255    }
00256    
00257    this->symmetrize();
00258 
00259 }
00260 
00265 void TPM::Q(TPM &tpm_d){
00266 
00267    SPM spm(tpm_d);
00268 
00269    double ward = tpm_d.trace()/(N*(N - 1.0)/2.0);
00270 
00271    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00272 
00273       int a = t2s[i][0];
00274       int b = t2s[i][1];
00275 
00276       for(int j = i;j < n;++j){
00277 
00278          int c = t2s[j][0];
00279          int d = t2s[j][1];
00280 
00281          (*this)(i,j) = tpm_d(i,j);
00282 
00283          if(i == j)
00284             (*this)(i,i) += ward;
00285 
00286          if(a == c)
00287             (*this)(i,j) -= spm(b,d);
00288 
00289          if(b == c)
00290             (*this)(i,j) += spm(a,d);
00291 
00292          if(b == d)
00293             (*this)(i,j) -= spm(a,c);
00294 
00295       }
00296    }
00297 
00298    this->symmetrize();
00299 
00300 }

00308 void TPM::G(PHM &phm){
00309 
00310    SPM spm(phm);
00311 
00312    int a,b,c,d;
00313 
00314    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00315 
00316       a = t2s[i][0];
00317       b = t2s[i][1];
00318 
00319       for(int j = i;j < n;++j){
00320 
00321          c = t2s[j][0];
00322          d = t2s[j][1];
00323 
00324          (*this)(i,j) = phm(b,d,c,a) - phm(a,d,c,b) - phm(b,c,d,a) + phm(a,c,d,b);
00325 
00326          if(b == d)
00327             (*this)(i,j) += spm(a,c);
00328 
00329          if(b == c)
00330             (*this)(i,j) -= spm(a,d);
00331 
00332          if(a == c)
00333             (*this)(i,j) += spm(b,d);
00334 
00335       }
00336 
00337    }
00338 
00339    this->symmetrize();
00340 
00341 }
00342 
00343 #endif

00348 void TPM::init(){
00349 
00350    double ward = N*(N - 1.0)/(2.0*n);
00351 
00352    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00353 
00354       (*this)(i,i) = ward;
00355 
00356       for(int j = i + 1;j < n;++j)
00357          (*this)(j,i) = (*this)(i,j) = 0.0;
00358 
00359    }
00360 
00361 }
00362 
00367 void TPM::proj_Tr(){
00368 
00369    double ward = (this->trace())/(double)n;
00370 
00371    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i)
00372       (*this)(i,i) -= ward;
00373 
00374 }

00383 void TPM::constr_grad(double t,TPM &ham,SUP &P){
00384 
00385    //eerst P conditie 
00386    *this = P.tpm(0);
00387 
00388    //de Q conditie toevoegen
00389 
00390 #ifdef __Q_CON
00391 
00392    TPM hulp(M,N);
00393 
00394    hulp.Q(P.tpm(1));
00395 
00396    *this += hulp;
00397 
00398 #endif
00399 
00400    //de G conditie indien nodig
00401 
00402 #ifdef __G_CON
00403 
00404    hulp.G(P.phm());
00405 
00406    *this += hulp;
00407 
00408 #endif
00409 
00410    //de T_1 conditie toevoegen indien nodig
00411 
00412 #ifdef __T1_CON
00413 
00414    hulp.T(P.dpm());
00415 
00416    *this += hulp;
00417 
00418 #endif
00419 
00420    this->dscal(t);
00421 
00422    *this -= ham;
00423 
00424    this->proj_Tr();
00425 
00426 }

00435 int TPM::solve(double t,SUP &P,TPM &b){
00436 
00437    int iter = 0;
00438 
00439    //delta = 0
00440    *this = 0;
00441 
00442    //residu:
00443    TPM r(b);
00444 
00445    //norm van het residu
00446    double rr = r.ddot(r);
00447 
00448    //enkele variabelen
00449    double rr_old,ward;
00450 
00451    TPM Hb(M,N);
00452 
00453    while(rr > 1.0e-7){ 
00454 
00455       Hb.H(t,b,P);
00456 
00457       ward = rr/b.ddot(Hb);
00458 
00459       //delta += ward*b
00460       this->daxpy(ward,b);
00461 
00462       //r -= ward*Hb
00463       r.daxpy(-ward,Hb);
00464 
00465       //nieuwe variabelen berekenen en oude overdragen
00466       rr_old = rr;
00467       rr = r.ddot(r);
00468 
00469       //nieuwe b nog:
00470       b.dscal(rr/rr_old);
00471 
00472       b += r;
00473 
00474       ++iter;
00475 
00476    }
00477 
00478    return iter;
00479 
00480 }

00489 double TPM::line_search(double t,SUP &P,TPM &ham){
00490 
00491    double tolerance = 1.0e-5*t;
00492 
00493    if(tolerance < 1.0e-12)
00494       tolerance = 1.0e-12;
00495 
00496    //neem de wortel uit P
00497    P.sqrt(1);
00498 
00499    //maak eerst een SUP van delta
00500    SUP S_delta(M,N);
00501 
00502    S_delta.fill(*this);
00503 
00504    //hulpje om dingskes in te steken:
00505    SUP hulp(M,N);
00506 
00507    hulp.L_map(P,S_delta);
00508 
00509    EIG eigen(hulp);
00510 
00511    double a = 0;
00512 
00513    double b = -1.0/eigen.min();
00514 
00515    double c(0);
00516 
00517    double ham_delta = ham.ddot(*this);
00518 
00519    while(b - a > tolerance){
00520 
00521       c = (b + a)/2.0;
00522 
00523       if( (ham_delta - t*eigen.lsfunc(c)) < 0.0)
00524          a = c;
00525       else
00526          b = c;
00527 
00528    }
00529 
00530    return c;
00531 
00532 }
00533 
00540 void TPM::H(double t,TPM &b,SUP &P){
00541 
00542    //eerst de P conditie:
00543 
00544    this->L_map(P.tpm(0),b);
00545 
00546    //de Q conditie toevoegen:
00547 #ifdef __Q_CON
00548 
00549    //hulpje
00550    TPM hulp(M,N);
00551 
00552    //maak Q(b)
00553    TPM Q_b(M,N);
00554    Q_b.Q(b);
00555 
00556    //stop Q(rdm)^{-1}Q(b)Q(rdm)^{-1} in hulp
00557    hulp.L_map(P.tpm(1),Q_b);
00558 
00559    //maak Q(hulp) en stop in Q_b
00560    Q_b.Q(hulp);
00561 
00562    //en tel op bij this
00563    *this += Q_b;
00564 
00565 #endif
00566 
00567    //de G conditie toevoegen:
00568    
00569 #ifdef __G_CON
00570 
00571    //hulpje voor het PHM stuk
00572    PHM hulp_ph(M,N);
00573    PHM G_b(M,N);
00574 
00575    //stop G(b) in G_b
00576    G_b.G(b);
00577 
00578    //bereken G(rdm)^{-1}G(b)G(rdm)^{-1} en stop in hulp_ph
00579    hulp_ph.L_map(P.phm(),G_b);
00580 
00581    //tenslotte nog de antisymmetrische G hierop:
00582    hulp.G(hulp_ph);
00583 
00584    //en optellen bij this
00585    *this += hulp;
00586 
00587 #endif
00588    
00589    //de T_1 conditie toevoegen
00590 
00591 #ifdef __T1_CON
00592 
00593    //hulpjes voor het DPM stuk
00594    DPM hulp_dp(M,N);
00595    DPM T1_b(M,N);
00596 
00597    //stop T1(b) in T1_b
00598    T1_b.T(b);
00599 
00600    hulp_dp.L_map(P.dpm(),T1_b);
00601 
00602    hulp.T(hulp_dp);
00603 
00604    *this += hulp;
00605 
00606 #endif
00607 
00608    //nog schalen met t:
00609    this->dscal(t);
00610 
00611    //en projecteren op spoorloze ruimte
00612    this->proj_Tr();
00613 
00614 }

00623 double TPM::line_search(double t,TPM &rdm,TPM &ham){
00624 
00625    SUP P(M,N);
00626 
00627    P.fill(rdm);
00628 
00629    P.invert();
00630 
00631    return this->line_search(t,P,ham);
00632 
00633 }

00642 void TPM::bar(DPM &dpm){
00643 
00644    int a,b,c,d;
00645 
00646    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00647 
00648       a = t2s[i][0];
00649       b = t2s[i][1];
00650 
00651       for(int j = 0;j < n;++j){
00652 
00653          c = t2s[j][0];
00654          d = t2s[j][1];
00655 
00656          (*this)(i,j) = 0.0;
00657 
00658          for(int l = 0;l < M;++l)
00659             (*this)(i,j) += dpm(a,b,l,c,d,l);
00660 
00661       }
00662    }
00663 
00664    this->symmetrize();
00665 
00666 }

00672 void TPM::T(DPM &dpm){
00673 
00674    double ward = 2.0*dpm.trace()/(N*(N - 1.0));
00675 
00676    int a,b,c,d;
00677 
00678    TPM tpm(M,N);
00679    tpm.bar(dpm);
00680 
00681    SPM spm(tpm);
00682 
00683    for(int i = 0;i < n;++i){
00684 
00685       a = t2s[i][0];
00686       b = t2s[i][1];
00687 
00688       for(int j = 0;j < n;++j){
00689 
00690          c = t2s[j][0];
00691          d = t2s[j][1];
00692 
00693          (*this)(i,j) = tpm(i,j);
00694 
00695          if(i == j)
00696             (*this)(i,j) += ward;
00697 
00698          if(b == d)
00699             (*this)(i,j) -= 0.5*spm(a,c);
00700 
00701          if(b == c)
00702             (*this)(i,j) += 0.5*spm(a,d);
00703 
00704          if(a == c)
00705             (*this)(i,j) -= 0.5*spm(b,d);
00706 
00707       }
00708 
00709    }
00710 
00711    this->symmetrize();
00712 
00713 }
